title: Black Left-Pointing Double Triangle with Vertical Bar

nouns: A mark to indicate a direction or relation
A mark to indicate a direction or relation.
A sign or symbol used to indicate a direction (e.g. \to).

description: A symbol used in media players to indicate skipping to the first or previous track (or scene). Shown as a vertical bar followed by two triangles pointing left.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the last track button emoji is a sleek, minimalist icon rendered with a polished, metallic sheen and subtle 3D depth. Its form is clean and precise, featuring a distinct triangular arrow pointing left, enclosed within a vertical bar, all with softly rounded edges typical of Apple’s design language. This intuitive symbol clearly signifies a desire to rewind or return to the previous item in a playlist or sequence, offering a seamless user experience.
